DOC.brief_summary: Analyis of the Glutathione Cycle in Children with Rett Syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of the Glutathione Cycle in Children With Rett Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: To analyze the levels of glutathione and relevant glutathione metabolites in children with Rett syndrome in an effort to better understand disease pathology and biochemistry.
DOC.criteria: Age between 2 and 10, inclusive Geneticallyconfirmed diagnosis of Rett syndrome with MeCP2 mutation No change in dietary supplements in three months prior to the initial blood draw No participation in interventional pharmaceutical clinical trials in prior 12 months None other than meeting Inclusion criteria
